mapper.select: SELECT n.id AS n_id, n.type AS n_type, employee.id AS e_id, employee.birthday AS e_birthday, employee.phone AS e_phone, employee.start_work AS e_start_work, employee.full_name AS e_full_name, employee.city AS e_city, proj.id AS proj_id, proj.name AS proj_name, proj.description AS proj_description, pres.id AS pres_id, pres.name AS pres_name, pres.link AS pres_link, pres.description AS pres_description FROM notification n JOIN employee ON n.employee_id = employee.id JOIN project proj ON employee.project_id = proj.id JOIN present pres ON employee.id = pres.employee_id WHERE n.id = #{id}
